scripts.prisma:generate: sh -c 'if [ -f prisma/schema.prisma ]; then prisma generate --schema=prisma/schema.prisma; else prisma generate --schema=apps/api/prisma/schema.prisma; fi'
scripts.prisma:migrate: sh -c 'if [ -f prisma/schema.prisma ]; then prisma migrate dev --schema=prisma/schema.prisma; else prisma migrate dev --schema=apps/api/prisma/schema.prisma; fi'
scripts.prisma:migrate:deploy: sh -c 'if [ -f prisma/schema.prisma ]; then prisma migrate deploy --schema=prisma/schema.prisma; else prisma migrate deploy --schema=apps/api/prisma/schema.prisma; fi'
